markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 16"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Greater Vital Evolution](/Feats.aspx?ID=6120) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Sorcerer" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=824" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 157 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Prerequisites**
[Primal Evolution](/Feats.aspx?ID=6097) or [Divine Evolution](/Feats.aspx?ID=6095)

</column>

---

Vital power surges through you like a font of energy. Twice per day, you can [cast a spell](/Actions.aspx?ID=2734) after you've run out of spell slots of the appropriate spell rank; the two spells you cast with this feat must be of different spell ranks.
name: Greater Vital Evolution

text: <title level="1" right="Feat 16" pfs="Standard" > Greater Vital Evolution Source Player Core 2 pg. 157 1.1 Prerequisites Primal Evolution or Divine Evolution --- Vital power surges through you like a font of energy. Twice per day, you can cast a spell after you've run out of spell slots of the appropriate spell rank; the two spells you cast with this feat must be of different spell ranks.
